name: San Francisco Convention & Meeting Planners
tag_list: san-francisco, convention, -meeting, planners, audience, response, q-ars
overview:
SFCMP is in the business of presenting presentations through our content management system. Q-ARS allows the professional meeting planner to take control where their event includes audience participation. Q-ARS software as a service is the smart advantage saving time and money.

Currently we are offering Q-ARS our audience response system for use in conferences and conventions. Q-ARS has been designed for reliability, speed and ease of use and it’s compatible with current networks. Patent #61/745,910 Filed December 26, 2012. San Francisco Convention and Meeting Planners content management system solves the technical glitches associated with presentations. SFCMP gives even the most experienced presenters “peace of mind” from running into common delivery problems associated with sizing, links and videos.

We have developed our social network called “the Scoop” a team building Social Forum for Convention & Meeting Planners. The Scoop will be live March 7, 2013 you join a team at http://sfcmp.com

SFCMP is developing a streamline automated process to help meeting planners distribute request for proposals in San Francisco to be known as SFCityAV.
